thread.title: N.Y. Gov. Andrew Cuomo Sees Uptick in Approval Rating

author: Mike Vilensky
title: N.Y. Gov. Andrew Cuomo Sees Uptick in Approval Rating
text:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo is heading into his 2018 re-election campaign with a strong approval rating, according to a poll released Tuesday.
Mr. Cuomo, a Democrat, has a 62% favorability rating in New York, according to the Siena College poll, a 10-point improvement over the same poll last year, and 76% favorability among Democrats, the highest marks since his first term.
